body: 三小 這個題材也太神奇了ㄅ
This is actually pretty sweet. Silly but enjoyable.
Nope...in this doujin world, there is this day called "naked school day", they forgot the correct date, hence the story.

So let me guess.
Mysteriously the couple ended up becoming naked but all people were mysteriously unable to register that, and at that end, it changed, the entire school recognition changed so that it because "it's weird and hilarious to be wearing clothes" interesting, but still weird
